story:
DOUBLE BOGEY
The Web Series

 

On behalf of the company we hope you can make a contribution to make our vision come to life. We'd like to make it a series thats memorable through the funny moments and the not so funny moments. 

Who doesn't love funny, unique, and compelling characters whom all come together for a round of golf!?

The 9 episodic web series will explore the comedic side of golf and modern day relationships. Each episode will run between 5-9 minutes. We want to make this funny and unique web series as professional as we can! So please help us reach our goal!

THE STORY

This story is centered around a not so lucky guy named TOM. Tom to say the least is a loser. The one thing he can't live without is his spicy girlfriend Talia, whom is on the verge of breaking up with him. In order to take his girlfriends heart back is to win a golf game(Tom hasn't played golf in a long time). 

FACEBOOK PAGE
https://www.facebook.com/DOUBLEBOGEYTheWebSeries/?notif_t=page_invite_accepted&notif_id=1498397016571292

INSTAGRAM
@DoubleBogeythewebseries

THE TEAM

THE DIRECTOR | PRODUCER

MICHAEL P. HAMM | MPH PRODUCTIONS LLC 

Michael has always loved making movies. He has made everything from music videos, demo reels, short films, commercials, and many other videos that he's proud to call his own! 

He is currently a Junior film student at WATKINS COLLEGE OF ART, DESIGN, AND FILM. 

IMDB PAGE

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm7433291/?ref_=nv_sr_1

VIMEO PAGE

https://vimeo.com/199382673

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER

JOSEPH AGUON DRAKE & DAVID G. BAKER | WHITE DOOR PRODUCTIONS LLC

Joseph & David own their own production company in Kentucky. They have been making many true/historical films where they live, which have drew a crowd of extras and other known actors in the mid-south. They are currently wrapping up their production of "THE INVASION OF KELLY"(based on a true story)You can find their page in the link below...

IMDB PAGE

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4083310/?ref_=nv_sr_1

YOUTUBE PAGE

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoHASDvZUFDeflM1_6dBGyw

 

DIRECTOR OF PHOTOGRAPHY

ISRAEL GARCIA

Israel is currently a well established film student at MIDDLE TENNESSEE STATE UNIVERSITY. He has played many key roles on many sets. He is hardworking, detail oriented and has a great eye for camera placement! Israel is an OUTSTANDING cinematographer and ready to lead the crew to make the series happen! 

 

THE LEAD TALENT

STEPHEN BREDFELDT
as TOM

 

CHECK OUT STEPHEN'S IMDB PAGE
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm7997284/?ref_=nv_sr_1

 

NATHAN AUSTIN
as MITCH

 

CHECK OUT NATHAN'S IMDB PAGE
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4543922/?ref_=nv_sr_1

 

JORDAN PHIPPS
as TALIA

 

CHECK OUT HER IMDB PAGE!
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm7123083/?ref_=nv_sr_1

 

What We Need...

With your help AND contribution you will help us reach the full potential of OUR web series.  We hope to achieve around $1500. The money will go towards the things that all productions need which are...


Catering(food/drinks/meals)
special equipment
Camera equipment
Locations
Props
Wardrobe
Compensation

 

WHAT YOU GET!

CHECK OUT THE AWESOME PERKS OF YOUR DONATION! INCLUDING SUCH THINGS LIKE...

  • SPECIAL THANKS IN THE CREDITS
  • SHOUTOUT ON SOCIAL MEDIA
  • A DIGITAL COPY OF THE PILOT EPISODE
  • THE POSTER
  • AUTOGRAPHED GOLF BALL
  • PRODUCER CREDIT
  • CO PRODUCER CREDIT
  • EXECUTIVE PRODUCER CREDIT
  • THE SCRIPT
  • DIGITAL COPY OF EVERY EPISODE
     

IN CONCLUSION...

Who doesn't love funny, unique, and compelling characters whom all come together for a round of golf!?

All we hope for is your generous contribution towards our web series. We hope this series puts a smile on your face from episode to episode. We'd like to make it a memorable experience for all audiences; just like the films of, "HAPPY GILMORE" AND "CADDYSHACK" to name a few. 

We have a hardworking & dedicated crew, with many gifted & talented actors! 

We will gladly accept any contribution!

Other Ways You Can Help

YOU can spread the word by sharing this page with your family and friends! You can like us on FACEBOOK and FOLLOW us on INSTAGRAM. Doing so you will be kept up to date on the production!

FACEBOOK
https://www.facebook.com/DOUBLEBOGEYTheWebSeries/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel

INSTAGRAM
@DOUBLEBOGEYthewebseries

THANK YOU in advance for your generous contribution!!
